short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open the map. Mark a location and share it on Facebook, Google+ and Twitter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open the map. Mark a location by hand or enable GPS to mark your current location. Make a post about it and share it in Facebook, Google+ and Twitter.
Your friends and followers will be able to browse pan and zoom the map that you post.
